string.value: #b#@1092011:##k in #b#m120000200##k says he has a favor to ask of you.

He says the #rSlimes#k in the forest are so similar to the green leaves that people have trouble telling them apart, which prevents those who are afraid of the monsters from entering the forest.

Eliminate 30 #rSlimes#k. They can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.

Report back to #b#@1092011:##k in #b#m120000200##k.

The #rSlimes#k in #b#m120000200##k are known to scare people by randomly popping out here and there, and you have eliminated 30 #b#p1092011##ks for #b#p1092011##k in #b#m120000200##k who is terrified of them.
I was on my way to #b#m101000000##k. I was singing and walking when I stepped on something squishy! I looked down and I had stepped on a #rSlime#k!

*Sob sob* I'm so scared of monsters. I especially hate how the #rSlimes#k blend in with other plants in the forest, making it utterly difficult for me to spot them!

So I want to ask you for a favor.
Could you eliminate some #rSlimes#k so that I don't have to worry whenever I trek through the forest?
Then will you eliminate 30 #rSlimes#k?\nYou'll see a lot of them in #b#m100040000##k.\nGood luck!
I suppose it was too much to ask of you...
You've already eliminated all of them? You're a strong one, aren't cha?
Now I can walk around the forest without having to worry about a single thing. Thank you.
You agreed rather quickly, so I thought you were confident. But you haven't hunted 30 #rSlimes#k yet?
